name: Drakkhen
description: The prophecy has been fulfilled. The world shall be ruled by the dragons. On an island far away, their lords prepare for the conquest of the lands. There is only one hope for mankind. The emperor sends out four heroes -- warriors and magicians -- to solve the puzzle of tears and prevent the invasion of the Drakkhen.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Memory: 256 MB RAM Storage: 100 MB available space
